contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 11, 1997 D West Wales BBA Contest (Fourth Section)
West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Fourth Section) 40 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Wales BBA Festival Contest west-wales-bba-festival-contest-fourth-section
None
Burry Port, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist - solo cornet - Glynneath. Prizes - 1st £120, 2nd £80, 3rd £60. 8 bands competed.
March 26, 2012, 6:33 p.m. July 3, 2020, 2:24 p.m.
1 Glynneath Silver Band A. J. Harris
2 Vale of Glamorgan Band Ivor Barnett
3 Pembroke Borough Band T. H. Bourne
4 Briton Ferry Band Jeffrey Pearce
5 Llwydcoed Band Mark Cheeke
6 Abertillery & District Youth R. J. Gowing
7 Ystradgynlais Public Band E. Alexander
8 Blaenavon Concert Band Ian Waite
